attributes.action: People's vote for EU deal or no deal only.
attributes.additional_details:
On 23/06/2016 the country was given a "once in a lifetime vote".
The result was a majority to leave which must be upheld.
Only the way in which leave happens should be the way forward.
attributes.background: The electorate voted to leave the EU. It is obvious that a people's vote would be popular but this must not be used to overturn a democratic vote but only to ascertain if the public want to leave with or without a deal with the EU
